titles.title: Providing for consideration of the resolution (H. Res. 965) authorizing remote voting by proxy in the House of Representatives and providing for official remote committee proceedings during a public health emergency due to a novel coronavirus, and for other purposes; providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 6800) making emergency supplemental appropriations for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2020, and for other purposes; providing for proceedings during the period from May 19, 2020, through July 21, 2020; and for other purposes.

Providing for consideration of the resolution (H. Res. 965) authorizing remote voting by proxy in the House of Representatives and providing for official remote committee proceedings during a public health emergency due to a novel coronavirus, and for other purposes; providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 6800) making emergency supplemental appropriations for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2020, and for other purposes; providing for proceedings during the period from May 19, 2020, through July 21, 2020; and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 116-421, by Mr. McGovern.
Rule provides for one hour of debate on H. Res. 965 and two hours of debate on H.R. 6800.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 79.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 967.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 219 - 182 (Roll No. 105).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 207 - 199 (Roll No. 106).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the resolution (H. Res. 965) authorizing remote voting by proxy in the House of Representatives and providing for official remote committee proceedings during a public health emergency due to a novel coronavirus, and for other purposes; providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 6800) making emergency supplemental appropriations for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2020, and for other purposes; providing for proceedings during the period from May 19, 2020, through July 21, 2020.
